data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Mechelen get the game underway.
Ruud Vormer scores to make it 1-0 at Jan Breydel Stadium.
In the minute 20, Ruud Vormer (Brugge) has received a yellow card from Jonathan Lardot.
Goal! Noa Lang extends Brugge's lead to 2-0.
Mechelen are back in the match in Bruges. Igor De Camargo has scored to make it 2-1.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Jan Breydel Stadium.
It's Brugge with the kick-off after the break.
Philippe Clement is making the team's first substitution at Jan Breydel Stadium with Charles De Ketelaere replacing Michael Krmencik.
In the minute 61, Brugge make their second substitution with Krepin Diatta replacing Noa Lang.
The away team have replaced Kerim Mrabti with Gustav Engvall. This is the first substitution made today by Wouter Vrancken.
Philippe Clement (Brugge) is making a third substitution, with Clinton Mata replacing Odilon Kossounou.
In the minute 73, Wouter Vrancken (Mechelen) is making a second substitution, with Rob Schoofs replacing Steven Defour.
Goal! The away team draw level at 2-2 through a header from Rob Schoofs.
The away team have replaced Igor De Camargo with Onur Kaya. This is the third substitution made today by Wouter Vrancken.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
